name: Patagonia Road to Regenerative Pocket T-Shirt - Men's
description:
An organic tee that helps fight back against climate change and encourage regenerative farming. Cotton comes from farms piloting regenerative organic certification, who aim to reduce the impact of farming and promote healthy soil practices.Taped shoulder seams for comfort and fit retention.Single chest pocket holds your sunnies.Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free.Patagonia original art.Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.Regular fit wears like an old fave.
